name: Fuel Quantity
description: Confirm fuel quantity is adequate for flight.
validation_logic: Sum of FQtyL and FQtyR should be in green range (10-28 gallons).

name: Oil Pressure
description: Check engine oil pressure is within normal range.
validation_logic: E1 OilP should be between 55-95 psi for normal operation.

name: Oil Temperature
description: Verify oil temperature is within limits.
validation_logic: E1 OilT should be between 100-235 °F for normal operation.

name: Engine RPM
description: Ensure engine RPM is within normal operating range.
validation_logic: E1 RPM should be less than or equal to 2700 RPM.

name: Manifold Pressure
description: Check manifold pressure is within normal range.
validation_logic: E1 MAP should be between 15-29.5 inHg for normal operation.
